name: Chiperia
description:
Chiperia is a very short game made for the 4MB Game Jam

You are an artificial bacteria that is being tested. Prove yourself worthy by completing the missions that are given!


Game file size: 2.3 MB

Exporting it as .exe is almost impossible under 4 MB. In Construct 2/3 blank project exe is more than 100 MB (NW.js) in Game Maker 8.1/Studio a blank project .exe is 3.5 MB
